timeline.bodyText: I have renamed this field. I am going to check in #8393. Please merge my PR.
timeline.author: sima-zhu
sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: This was inline instantiated at the property, no need to include this in the constructor if it will be created for every client.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Add @link for SearchApiKeyCredential . The SearchApiKeyCredential is used to authenticate HTTP requests.
timeline.author: sima-zhu

timeline.bodyText:
To my point of view, error message change is also a breaking change. Verify the message right here can make sure developer pay attention when they make a change to the error message.
I prefer to assert the message as well.
timeline.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: Exception messages are treated on a per case basis on whether they are considered a breaking change, with the general decision being would this message be programmatically consumed. Given that this is a runtime exception that isn't networking related I believe this would be unlikely so there isn't a strong conviction on testing the message of the exception.
replies.author: alzimmermsft
